context.p: The test case execution status can be exported from the test campaign in Excel format.
Users can navigate to a test campaign execution where they will have the following options:
context.ol:
Export View:
exports the test case details that are visible in the table
Export All:
exports all test case details even those not shown in the current view

step.cmd: Decide whether you wish to Export View or Export All
step.info: If you decide to Export view please move to step two otherwise select 'Export All'

info.p: Exports test cases shown in results table.

result.p: Data is exported to csv and automatically downloaded.
